item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Cravath, Swaine & Moore Logo
Cravath, Swaine & Moore LLP is an American white-shoe law firm with its headquarters in New York City, and an additional office in London. The firm, one of the most prestigious law firms in the United States, is known for its complex and high profile litigation and mergers & acquisitions work. Cravath has been consistently ranked as the #1 most prestigious law firm in the United States in the “Vault 100”, an annual, national ranking of U.
You can download theCravathlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Mayer Brown Logo Mayer Brown is a global white-shoe law firm, headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, United States. It has offices in 27 cities across the Americas, Asia, Europe, and the Middle East, with its largest offices being in Chicago, Washington, D.C., New York City, Hong Kong, and London. Mayer Brown has more than 1,800 lawyers and by revenue is the 19th largest law firm in the world. Source
You can download theMayer Brownlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
